name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance, scalable applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in building **RESTful APIs** and implementing **microservice architecture** using **Kotlin** and **Spring Boot**. Experienced in database management with **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, ensuring optimal **system performance** and **scalability**. Skilled at applying **automated testing** and **test-driven development** methodologies to enhance code quality and reduce **technical debt**.

Strong advocate for **monitoring and observability** to drive continuous improvement. Adept in **agile delivery**, fostering collaboration among teams, and providing mentorship to junior developers. Original strengths include hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a solid foundation in frontend technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Additionally experienced in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, constructing AI/ML-powered platforms using **FastAPI** and **Django**, and implementing CI/CD pipelines that support rapid delivery.
